message.content:
To extract the specific line item and value of the decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit during the period, we need to look for the line in the cash flow statement that mentions "(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable." This line indicates the change in amounts owed by customers for goods or services sold on credit.

Now, let's analyze the cash flow statement provided in the problem:

```
| Account                                    | Amount        | Date       |
| ------------------------------------------ | ------------- | -----------|
| Cash Flow From Operating Activities         |               | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Profit                                 | 835266.51     | 2024-02-05 |
| Depreciation                               | 92870.67      | 2024-02-05 |
| (Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable  | -2117339.65   | 2024-02-05 |
| (Increase) Decrease in Interest Receivable   | -15023.59     | 2024-02-05 |
| (Increase) Decrease in Inventory           | -203000.00    | 2024-02-05 |
| Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable    | 247000.00     | 2024-02-05 |
| Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable         | 131850.51     | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities     | -1028375.55   | 2024-02-05 |
| Cash Flow from Investing Activities         |               | 2024-02-05 |
| Purchase of Fixed Assets                   | 85889.19      | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Cash Flow from Investing Activities     | -85889.19     | 2024-02-05 |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents                  |               | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance                           | 8000000.00    | 2024-02-05 |
| Ending Balance                              | 6885735.26     | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Increase                               | -1114264.74   | 2024-02-05 |
```

From this analysis, we can see the following relevant line for the task:

- **(Increase) Decrease in Accounts Receivable:** -2117339.65

This line indicates a decrease in amounts owed to the entity for goods or services sold or provided on credit during the period. Since only one line item pertains to the decrease in accounts receivable, we can conclude that this is the value we need to present in the solution.

Now, formatting it into the required JSON format:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '-2117339.65'} }
```
